column4: if they dont' make a linux version you need to use wine and install it.
sudo apt-get install wine
then you can just wine setup.exe or whatever. to install it.
or right click ont he exe and set wine to be the default for exe files
with wine not funcion
you mean it doesn't work with wine
whats the name of the game again?
yes..... doesn't work  with wine
Carom3d
is a online virtual pool
You need to get MFC42.DLL from  www.dll-files.com/  and put it in ~/.wine/drive_c/windows/system
you can check out appdb.wine-hq.org  search there for directions if they have any.
if it doesn't work though might not work with linux then.  Unless you runa  virtual box of windows and install there.  But that would be painfully slow.
have a msg fixme:wave:ALSA_AddCaptureDevice Add support for DSCapture
did it open or just error out and do nothing?
so this message fixme:wave:ALSA_AddCaptureDevice Add support for DSCapture
the other option is to try to ask in the wine support
/j winehq
/j #winehq
they may be able to help more.
thanks
